text: There have been a number of battles known as the Battle of Saint Quentin, most of which were fought in the vicinity of Saint-Quentin, Aisne in Picardy, France. * Battle of St. Quentin (1557), Savoy-Spanish victory over the French in the Habsburg-Valois Wars * Battle of St. Quentin (1871), during the Franco- Prussian War * Battle of St. Quentin (1914), also known as the Battle of Guise, between French and German forces * Battle of St. Quentin (1918), part of the German Spring Offensive Operation Michael * Battle of Mont Saint- Quentin, attack at Mont St. Quentin near Péronne by the Australian Corps in August 1918 * Battle of St Quentin Canal, attack by the British Fourth Army on the Hindenburg Line in September 1918 ==See also== *Battle of the Canal du Nord
title: Battle of St. Quentin
